resources.string: All your project TODOs in one place!
Or Login With Github To See and Edit Your TODOs
At last, you can easily obsess about them wherever you go
Background image with computer and Github usb stick
No Repos to display. Try searching for a Github username above!
No TODOs yet! Why not add one?

This app will let you manage your project project TODO lists wherever you go! Grab your TODOs from GitHub, save the ones you want to remember and (eventually) add notes/prioritize/organize them to your heart\'s content.
(Publishing TODOS as Github issues to be implemented someday!)
4. View and edit your TODOs as much as you want
3. Once you have saved some repos and todos, you will be able to access them from the main page
(Code scraping for todos to be implemented someday!)
2. From there, you can view and save repos and TODOs taken from your repo issues
1. Start by searching Github for your username
No saved repos yet, please go to the Github section of the App and find some to save
